org.atmosphere.cpr

Interface AtmosphereResourceHeartbeatEventListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AtmosphereResourceEventListener, WebSocketEventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AtmosphereResourceEventListenerAdapter, AtmosphereResourceEventListenerAdapter.OnBroadcast, AtmosphereResourceEventListenerAdapter.OnClose, AtmosphereResourceEventListenerAdapter.OnDisconnect, AtmosphereResourceEventListenerAdapter.OnHeartbeat, AtmosphereResourceEventListenerAdapter.OnPreSuspend, AtmosphereResourceEventListenerAdapter.OnResume, AtmosphereResourceEventListenerAdapter.OnSuspend, AtmosphereResourceEventListenerAdapter.OnThrowable, ManagedAtmosphereHandler, PaddingAtmosphereInterceptor.ForcePreSuspend, WebSocketEventListenerAdapter

    public interface AtmosphereResourceHeartbeatEventListener
    Receive notifications when heartbeat events occur.

    2.2
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
